title: Rahu Transit in the 4th House for Gemini Ascendant
summary: Rahu transiting the fourth house brings restlessness around home, emotional security, and inner peace. Desire for change in living conditions, property, or lifestyle increases, often in unconventional ways. Emotional satisfaction may feel unstable, pushing you to redefine what comfort truly means. While relocation, renovations, or modern setups are favored, grounding is essential to avoid inner anxiety.

sections.heading: Career
points: Real estate, tech, or remote work favored

sections.heading: Finance
points: Expenses on home, property, or gadgets

closing: This transit reshapes the idea of home and comfort. Grounded choices turn restlessness into renewal.
